programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024)
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Dan Bourchier in the morning to bring you whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024)
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S35
programme.desc: Clarence visits a garden transformed with native plants, Sophie gives us her best rental garden tips, Millie visits a community doing great things with silverbeet, and we meet a mosquito researcher.

programme.title: Rottnest Island, Tamar Valley, Mildura
programme.desc: Ernie is welcomed onto Wadjemup by a Whadjuk elder, Rae gets a taste of Tassies Tamar Valley with a wine educator and Narelda takes on trapeze in regional Victoria.

programme.title: Larapinta S1
programme.desc: Protecting language goes hand in hand with revitalising country, and the Pertame language school is teaching a new generation. Kevin Ungwunaka introduces Talia to Running Waters, where the battle for conservation is imminent.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S4
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2024)
programme.desc: Live from Canberra on a Friday afternoon, we bring you the latest on the day in politics, national and global affairs, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders. Plus a panel recap the weeks top stories.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe OBrien (2024)
programme.desc: Joe OBrien brings you a comprehensive summary of the days events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on whats going on.

programme.title: ABC National News (2024)
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the days stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: The World (2024)
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats going on in our world. At the earlier time of 9pm AEDT Manny Tsigas brings you the latest international news and interviews with correspondents and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week (2024)
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Close Of Business (2024)
programme.desc: Alicia Barry presents a weekly roundup of business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and overseas markets, analysing whats going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: Born In Hope
programme.desc: The series begins at the NSW Supreme Court where we hear if Leonard Warwick - a man accused of four murders and five bombings that hit at the very heart of Australias legal system - will walk free, or face justice.

programme.title: Nakkiah Lui
programme.desc: Nakkiah Lui grew up in a close-knit Aboriginal family in Western Sydney, fiercely proud of her heritage but uncertain of her place in the world. Now shes forging a path as a playwright, actor and comedian.

programme.title: Food
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Armstrong this series uncovers surprising stories behind some of our most iconic Australian stuff. This episode looks at food including classics like the meat pie, Macadamia nut, Chiko Roll and Vegemite.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat

programme.title: Girlfriend Aku Dari Neraka the Series
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang jejaka bernama Rudi, yang merupakan seorang player dan sering kali bertukar teman wanita. Dia kemudian telah jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis yang diidamkan. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan olehnya untuk memikat hati gadis tersebut dan dapatkah dia memihat hati gadis tersebut?

programme.title: Prankap Show
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular merancang "prank" bersama geng mereka dan mengenakan mangsa terpilih. Berjayakan perancangan "prank" mereka? Sama-sama kita nantikan!

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Jihan Show

programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. The sky is full of big grey rain clouds in the real world. Messy watches his sandcastle outside get washed away by the pouring rain. Why does it have to rain? He competes in the OKIDO flower competition and finds out why.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness and innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the "Full Moon Scimitar

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clans fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the "Tsai Li Fu" style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (whos done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, its the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. Its a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because peoples lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huangs wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husbands death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfathers fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Crazy N The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nams dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris passion for work and life.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangsters son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kongs brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the schools stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Rileys mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kongs biggest stars_x000D_

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Mans father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. Bs superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Lets Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Conman 2002
programme.desc: Li Ka Shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until he is advised by a master to move his ancestral tomb so as to change his luck. From that day onwards, Li wins at every game in the casino. When his rival uncovers the secret, he destroys Lis ancestral tomb to gain the upper hand. Will Li win the finals of the gambling competition?

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsus funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Tycoon Cheung is back in China after being abroad for five years and finds his long-lost daughter, Ling, in a poor village. To transform his unrefined and dirty daughter into a lady, Cheung hires Joe as Lings image consultant.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her fathers underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macaus economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Dont Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sangs father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from Tos father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you whats moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Part 2 (B)
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Stone Cold Murder
programme.desc: A man is gunned down outside a local shop and authorities interrogate two of his acquaintances to find out which one of them pulled the trigger.

programme.title: A Watery Grave
programme.desc: Jeff and Jeannine Glanda have a picture-perfect family until selfishness and a shameless affair mark the beginning of the end. Money troubles and the threat of divorce breed paranoia and hate.
A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a familys home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

A woman attacks a bus driver in an out-of-control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store. And more.

programme.title: Wade and Alexis
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: Kerri and Devonte
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devontes gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: Rogue Gun
programme.desc: When a devoted father is gunned down in Georgia, detectives uncover a string of shootings terrorising a community. Police and prosecutors must rely on circumstantial evidence to catch the shooter.

programme.title: Ice Cold In Denver
programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalised. After 37 years, investigators tap into a public genealogy website that leads them to the killer theyve been hunting.

programme.title: Eyes Of A Killer
programme.desc: In February 2010, two gunmen shoot Michael Temple Jr, rendering him quadriplegic for the five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Part 2 (B)
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Deadly Dad
programme.desc: After a 20-year-old man is crushed by a truck that fell off its jack, the victims father is brought in to face questions over whether it was really an accident or murder.
Joel Rifkin took the lives of 17 women in New York. Almost thirty years later, a TV producer leverages his relationship with New Yorks most prolific serial killer to get information police could use.

programme.title: Far From Home
programme.desc: In 2017, Chinese exchange student Yingying Zhang vanishes from the University of Illinois campus. Police and the FBI turn to surveillance footage to uncover the shocking and sinister truth.

programme.title: The Good Samaritan
programme.desc: Young professional Sasha Samsudean is brutally murdered in her apartment in Orlando. Detectives must turn to video surveillance footage to solve the mystery and bring a cold-blooded killer to justice.

programme.title: That Was Your Final Warning
programme.desc: A car chase transpires to rescue a hostage being held at gunpoint. After being shocked by 14,000 volts of electricity, a mans chance of survival is in the hands of his friend.

programme.title: Sally
programme.desc: A savvy poker player cleans up at the tables once at sea. But after she witnesses a man overboard, many begin to wonder if it was accidental or on purpose - and who is next?

programme.title: Love Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Bad decisions cause people to get booked in, including a first-timer that resisted arrest for riding their bicycle on the wrong side of the road, a couple that had half a pound of meth.

programme.desc: Strands of hair hold the key to solving a murder mystery when a woman and her three-month-old son are found dead.

programme.title: The Master Key
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Turf War
programme.desc: Its a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Babys tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Dire Straits
programme.desc: Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berks trade.

programme.title: The Good Book
programme.desc: Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: Where Theres Smoke
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap
programme.desc: On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Spinny Water / Kelps Song
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Welcome to Harmony Harbor
programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: The Pawmazing Race
programme.desc: One of Tags biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. Which is why she entered her entire family to compete in the family edition! And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. Tag learns that her familys quirky traits can help them through any obstacle.

programme.title: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Full House / Gift Express
programme.desc: Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Edens fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harpers family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.title: Spinny Water / Kelps Song

programme.title: Night
programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Rollodons
programme.desc: When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvins new animal hybrid invention to create a creature thats a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals convention.Theres no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Spinny Water / Kelps Song

programme.title: The Yarn Fairy / Bake It Til You Make It
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think theyre a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves.

programme.title: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks
programme.desc: When Tip cant solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he cant "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: Waltor / Out Foxed
programme.desc: When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: Lucky and the Resolutionary Fever
programme.desc: Lucky rushes to complete all of last years resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Years Eve

programme.title: Lucky and the Cousin Caper
programme.desc: Lucky and the PALs must rescue Julian after he gets in too deep while pledging a secret society at his school

programme.title: Lucky and the Wayward Wedding
programme.desc: Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Untitled Templeton Project
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the towns faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Biscuits Rising
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby whos been hired to wreck Boss and Tinas lives. Crispin puts the new companys loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.desc: The twins are preparing for their birthday when they are visited by a notoriously mischievous relative administering the Thorston Rite of Passage challenges

programme.title: Lucky and the Thin Ice
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: He Got Game Night/73
programme.desc: Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skids advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Keith is sent on a mission to destroy a weapon before Galra forces can find it

programme.title: Sherman From A To Zzzz/Akashi Shiganosuke
programme.desc: When Sherman hasnt slept in days because of a recurring nightmare, he causes mayhem on the set and Peabody must help Sherman confront his fears

programme.title: Pips Playground
programme.desc: Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Mud Sculptures
programme.desc: It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: The Case Of The Spooky Noise
programme.desc: The Naughticorns have borrowed Noddys music player to practise a special dance for Pat-Pats Pumpkin Party. But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: whats making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player.

programme.title: The Case Of The Upset Animals
programme.desc: Something upsets all the animals at the farm at night and no one can get to sleep . Farmer Tom asks Noddy to investigate before night falls so that everyone can go to sleep properly. Using his wwwbook to gather clues and using all his investigation skills Noddy travels all over Toyland to find out what has been disturbing the animals. He works out that the new stickers that PatPat gave to the the animals are made out of glow in the dark paper.

programme.title: Why Hummingbird Hums
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Hummingbird didnt hum. She was called Songbird and Songbird thought she could sing like a Bird but sadly that was not the case. All the animals tried to help Songbird improve her singing but nothing worked. What could they do?! Then Tortoise has an idea, maybe Songbird can sing without opening her beak!! Songbird agrees and hums the most beautiful hum Tinga Tinga has ever heard. From that day on Songbird was called Hummingbird. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Baboon Has A Bare Bottom
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Baboon didnt have a bare bottom and he was very naughty. Baboon loved to play tricks. He played tricks on Elephant. He played tricks on Ostrich. He even dared to play tricks on Lion, the King of Tinga Tinga! And then all the animals decided it was time for the tricks to stop and Baboon to get a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Silver Hatch Pizza
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor has demanded pizza for lunch but the pizzeria is closed. How is Marsha going to ensure Mr Carburettor gets the lunch he asked for?

programme.title: Silver Hatch Stars
programme.desc: Roary is feeling put out as all the cars are paying Conrod too much attention. He is determined to show his worth when they race that afternoon. But tries too hard and ends up in danger. Who can save him?

programme.title: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, and Beyond
programme.desc: When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish
programme.desc: When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Ohs life in the process

programme.title: Newbeings On The Block / Juicy Gossip
programme.desc: When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks hes a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucys behalf

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind
programme.desc: When Mort is abducted by "aliens

programme.title: The Butterfly War
programme.desc: King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdoms spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: The Business Boss: Back in Baby
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, hell need to win over Tims family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: The Stroll
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field teams focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! Its now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor whos huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Moles
programme.desc: Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: Mermaid
programme.desc: To prove hes a ladies man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon
programme.desc: The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Coop, Wheres My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest
programme.desc: When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branchs favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Lair
programme.desc: D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew whos boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Battering Ram
programme.desc: When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no ones having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. programme.title: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop
programme.desc: When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that its a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isnt very good at "Hide and Seek" so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now shes going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Le Grand Derriere / Im Your Boovest Fan
programme.desc: Lucy changes after becoming the first human-chef at a fancy Boov restaurant; Oh is an obsessed superfan of a tee-ball team and uses Boov-tech to cheat.

programme.title: Scared Crazy / Superslushious
programme.desc: Tip and Oh go camping but soon learn about a crazy Boov who scares everyone; Oh upgrades Slushious to "Superslushious" things get out of hand.

programme.title: Lucky and the Railroad Ransom
programme.desc: When Butch LePray hold Jim for ransom, Lucky and Spirit team up with the unlikeliest of allies to get her father back

programme.title: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy
programme.desc: Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julians new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Lucky and the Jam Jam
programme.desc: The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fools Day fever

programme.title: The Business Boss: Back in Baby
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, hell need to win over Tims family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: The Stroll
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field teams focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Potty Mouth
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tinas search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabithas research paper and for Baby Corps online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Viking For Hire

programme.title: Animal House

programme.title: Pajuna Serves Spirits
programme.desc: Pajuna attempts to tell fortunes and gets possessed with an evil spirit, out to get revenge on Puss

programme.title: Mi Amore Wing
programme.desc: Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.title: Le Grand Derriere / Im Your Boovest Fan
programme.desc: Lucy changes after becoming the first human-chef at a fancy Boov restaurant; Oh is an obsessed superfan of a tee-ball team and uses Boov-tech to cheat.

programme.title: One More Cup, Part 2
programme.desc: King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom but when Karls brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation trouble start to brew

programme.title: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine
programme.desc: The PALs agree to work on Graysons ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Crew Detective/Whiplash Effect
programme.desc: Whiplash interrogates the crew to find out who broke his stuff; the crew tricks Whiplash into having a fun, new personality after he loses his memory.

programme.title: White Lion
programme.desc: Secrets unfold when the team uses Haggars map to ventur eto a mythical planet

programme.title: Orchoptitron In Love/John Harrington
programme.desc: When Orchoptitron breaks up with his love - the toaster oven - Peabody and Sherman take it upon themselves to cheer him up by playing The Data Game

programme.title: Stingos Naughty Day
programme.desc: Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Shrinking Pip
programme.desc: The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasnt grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: The Case Of The Empty Swapsie Wagon
programme.desc: Cloppycorn is in charge of the Swapsy Game. Everyone puts a toy into the Swapsy Wagon and takes a toy out! Its brilliant fun - until the fairies yo yo. disappears from the wagon altogether. Cloppycorns very upset. No one will trust him to pull the wagon again! Noddy tells him not to worry. Hes going to investigate and help Cloppycorn find the missing toys.

programme.title: The Case Of The Unhappy Unicorn
programme.desc: Cloppycorn is very upset unhappy because his special felt ball, Snuggleball, is missing. Noddy needs to investigate quickly! He follows the clues around Fable Forest and discovers that PatPat broke snuggleball by mistake when she rode over it with her scooter. Noddy asks PatPat to make a new snuggleball but Cloppycorn doesnt like it. It doesnt feel cuddly like his special toy. Clever Noddy asks everyone in Toyland to give the new snuggleball a big hug.

programme.title: Why Bees Sting
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bees didnt sting. All the animals loved the Bees and they especially loved their sweet and yummy honey. The trouble was all the precious honey was disappearing and there was a honey crisis in Tinga Tinga. Something had to be done. Luckily clever old Tortoise has a cunning plan. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Peacock Struts
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Peacock didnt strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga. But as Lion so wisely points out Sometimes its not good to get everything you want! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: High-Tech Overload
programme.desc: Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Workshop Chaos
programme.desc: Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - hows he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song "just for them

programme.title: The Secret Ingredient / Delete That Dew!
programme.desc: When Harper is missing an ingredient to make her Moms favorite dessert on Mothers Day, Eden enlists the help of her fellow Dew Drops to do an emergency city-wide ingredient search! / When Marcus records a video of his inventions, Phoebe gets caught on camera and must erase the footage before Marcus sees, or her Dew Drop cover will be blown!

programme.title: Humanspeople Safari / Happy Space Troopers
programme.desc: Oh introduces Tip to the strange world of Boovian Earth tours; Rejected by the Junior Lady Rangers, Oh and Tip form their own all-inclusive scouts, sparking a turf war

programme.title: Krebbles Is Real / Tips Diary
programme.desc: When Oh thinks that his favorite TV show is real, Tip tries to maintain the illusion; When Tips diary gets boring for Oh, he decides to create drama in her life to liven up his favorite book

programme.title: Fast Food Lemur Nation
programme.desc: Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces "fast food" to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Get Off My Lawn
programme.desc: When King Julien thinks hes a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Imaginary Friends
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tinas imaginary friend, hes forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive its an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvins new animal hybrid invention to create a creature thats a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Squad
programme.desc: Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods
programme.desc: Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swifts next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Party Crashed
programme.desc: When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: Racetrack
programme.desc: Ton-Tons friends, The Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.

programme.title: Gluphosaurus
programme.desc: When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to "unstick" the crew from one another.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvins cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Las Vegas Finale: Part 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. With the bright lights of Las Vegas shining on the finalists and the crowd cheering on the competition, the ANW finale celebrates the passion of all the aspiring Ninja Warriors that pursued the privilege to grapple with the famously intimidating Mount Midoriyama.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew One Gear Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Adrien Broner taking on Martin Rodriguez to determine the new WBO super featherweight world champion. With both fighters looking for their first major world championship, one left hook will bring about a new champion. Also on the card, action from multi-weight champion Paul Williams and Verno Phillips.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 1 featuring Endo, Abi, Meisei and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Pawel Mikolajuw
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 37 in Krakow Poland, highlighted by a Heavyweight showdown between hard-punching Mariusz Puszianowski taking on the Popek Monster Pawel Mikolajuw. Both fighters weigh in at over 250 lbs. and can end the fight at any moment. Its Pudzianowski vs. Mikolajuw, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka The Galaxy Warrior, (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali Rush Hour Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: In Bangkok, Thailand
programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 2
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Tamawashi, Myogiryu, Takanoiwa and Yoshikaze from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Heath Todd
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (61-3-1 29 KO) vs. Heath Todd (32-10-0 13 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from the War Memorial Auditorium in Ft. Lauderdale FL USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Nkazimulo Zulu vs. Jake Hadley
programme.desc: This episode features a flyweight championship bout as Jake Hadley takes on the veteran Nkazimulo Zulu. Bonus coverage includes Mutuale Basambombo vs. HP Van Staden and Christian Bobo vs. Adrian Sanchez.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Sugar Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: Zagreb Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judos biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: Budapest 2023 - Episode 3
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.
