programme.title: Riding The Storm Out
programme.desc: Ben and Gwens camping trip is interrupted by the emotionless Weatherheads. But a malfunctioning Omnitrix, firing out a mishmash of aliens, may not be the forecast for success.

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Touring Yellowstone, Ben uncovers a plot by the fast and furious LaGrange to find treasure buried below the national park. But with Old Faithfuls help, Overflow is able to douse LaGranges dreams.

programme.title: Brief Career Of Lucky Girl
programme.desc: When a wizard cosplayer gets his hands on a real, magical wand at Comic Con, Ben enlists Gwen to help stop Hex from retrieving it.

programme.title: Waterfilter
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Maxs trip to Niagara Falls is cut short by the horrid Hydromanders - creatures menacing them and their fellow tourists.

programme.title: Shhh!
programme.desc: While relaxing at a monastery with a no-noise policy, Ben cant keep quiet and accidentally awakens a dangerous dragon hidden in a secret chamber below the hallowed halls.

programme.title: The Prince And The Playdate Part 2
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is a prisoner in the castle dungeon of Jezabels mother, Grizabella - the unpredictable and slightly terrifying Queen of Thieves.

programme.title: The Prince And The Legendary Rabbit Hood
programme.desc: Mistaking Prince Ivandoe for a lowly peasant, Rabbit Hood bestows upon him precious jewellery - that she has stolen from a Prince.

programme.title: The Prince And The Yucky Duckling
programme.desc: A Hooded Stranger from Prince Ivandoes past seeks revenge, by attempting to ruin Ivandoes perfect princely appearance.

programme.title: The Prince And The Unruly Royal
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe receives instructions from his father, The Mighty Stag. He is to escort his spoilt cousin Dudley to a correctional school.

programme.title: The Prince And The Show-Off Stallion
programme.desc: When the legendary Mighty Stallion "out-heros" Prince Ivandoe, by saving the Bunny Village from a terrifying beastie, Ivandoe loses his confidence.

programme.title: The Kitty Sitters
programme.desc: Theres a lost kitten on Sesame Street. While Chris and Elmo put up signs to try to find the kittens owner, Grover and Cookie Monster help look after it and learn all about how to take care of a kitten.

programme.title: Irrigation Irritation
programme.desc: Tamir is leaving for robotics camp and needs to figure out how to keep the garden watered while hes away. With help from his friends, Tamir makes a drip irrigation system so the community garden can get plenty of water.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Meryl Streep stars in this well-loved musical which follows a girl as she invites three men to her wedding, one of whom she suspects to be her father.

programme.title: The Frog Prince
programme.desc: Sinbad is the voice of the lonely, enchanted frog who longs for the love of a princess. With Danny Glover, LeVar Burton and Jay Leno.

programme.title: An American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong
programme.desc: When Chrissa moves to a new school in the middle of the year, she is greeted by the girls in her fourth-grade class with teasing and tricks.

programme.title: Tote Life
programme.desc: The Bears realise that eco-friendly tote bags are their way of gaining acceptance amongst the progressive people of the Bay Area after being shamed for asking for plastic grocery bags.

programme.title: Video Date
programme.desc: Panda is an avid e-dater and when a French woman matches with him and agrees to a video chat date, the Bears engineer the situation so that Panda can show his best side, even if its exaggerated.

programme.title: Chloe And Ice Bear
programme.desc: Chloe realises that Ice Bear only runs errands for his brothers so she is determined to show him a fun day in the city, even if it means staying in a museum after it closes.

programme.title: Hibernation
programme.desc: When the city plans to destroy the Bears cave in order to make way for a new cell phone tower, Grizz and Panda must find evidence from their past that proves they have rights to their land.

programme.title: Occupy Bears
programme.desc: When the city plans to destroy the Bears cave in order to make way for a new cell phone tower, Grizz and Panda must find evidence from their past that proves they have rights to their land.

programme.title: Bright Lights, Black Hearts
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max stop by the graveyard set of Gwens favourite TV show, The Unalivers. Before long, Ben discovers its lead, Michael Morningstar, is an energy vampire.

programme.title: Adventures In Babysitting
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max meet a family that appears to be a mirror image of them, but when Max goes off on a hike with their matriarch, Maxine, Ben is forced to babysit the bratty Simon Sez.

programme.title: Steam Is The Word
programme.desc: In the heart of Silicon Valley, Ben has to stop Victorian villain, Steam Smythe, from securing an epic power source sealed in a Tesla time capsule.

programme.title: Recipe For Disaster
programme.desc: During Chefapalooza in the Rocky Mountains, three famous chefs and infamous bad-guys, The Tri-Chefta, hunt down Wildvine in hopes of creating their most exotic dish to date.

programme.title: All Wet
programme.desc: No one believes Ben when he insists that one of the other patrons, waiting in line at the World of Wet Water Park, is the nefarious Frightwig, disguised as a common girl.

programme.title: The Prince And The Dark Lord Of Moletown
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is unsurprised to discover that he is worshipped by a group of moles.

programme.title: The Prince And The Squire-Off
programme.desc: Bert enters a prestigious Squire-Off tournament, in order to prove himself worthy of being Prince Ivandoes squire.

programme.title: The Prince And The Kissy Curse
programme.desc: An arrogant little frogman needs the help of Prince Ivandoe to lift his curse and become the big, beautiful bullfrog he once was.

programme.title: The Prince And The Nutty Wedding
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe triumphantly finds the One True Acorn, during a rigged royal contest.

programme.title: The Prince And The Golden Father
programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe saves the life of a Wishapillar, he is granted a wish.

programme.title: Bert And Ernies Opposite Day
programme.desc: Its Opposite Day on Sesame Street and everyones doing things that are as different as they can be. Bert and Ernie notice that everyones having fun doing opposites and realize they like so many opposite things too!

programme.title: Elmo And Abbys Ocean Adventure
programme.desc: Abby turns Sesame Street into a magical ocean so Dorothy can swim anywhere she likes but when she disappears, Elmo and Abby follow clues to find her.

programme.title: Taz: Quest For Burger
programme.desc: After an outlaw attacks her father and steals their towns food for the winter, a feisty Bandicoot girl named Quinn hires The Tasmanian Devil, an ill-tempered rogue with a fearsome reputation, to help track down the criminal through the wilds of Tasmania.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: An island is populated entirely by happy, flightless birds - or almost entirely.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Pig Islands is in danger. Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chucks sister and team up with pigs to forge a truce to save their homes.

programme.desc: After accidentally creating a Timenado, two slacker groundskeepers have to go back in time and battle an evil volleyball coach in order to save the universe... and their friendship.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Christmas Carole
programme.desc: Meet Carole McKay, she doesnt love Christmas at all. But this Christmas Eve, Caroles past, present and future are about to collide.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A man falls in love with a woman who suffers from severe short-term memory loss.

programme.title: Charlie and The Snake
programme.desc: Charlie (aka Bigfoot) would love to find a place for himself in the world. Charlie throws a party, but ends up going on an adventure with the unlikeliest of animals - a wild snake.

programme.title: Viral Video
programme.desc: The Bears think they have what it takes to make and star in a viral video, but when Nom-Nom decides that they dont, Grizz breaks into the koalas limo in an effort to change his mind.

programme.title: Our Stuff
programme.desc: After the Bears play a little pickup basketball (theyre very bad), they go back to grab their stuff by the side of the court, only to find theyve been stolen!

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: Chloe spends time with the Bears for an upcoming presentation. But when the Bears sneak a peek at her dry report, the Bears decide to jazz it up with exaggerated facts about themselves.

programme.title: Pandas Date
programme.desc: When a vendor at the Farmers Market (Lucy) sticks Panda with an EpiPen, reviving him after an allergic reaction, Panda comes to in the arms of his dream girl.

programme.title: Burrito
programme.desc: Grizz likes burritos. A lot. So much so that after a restaurant makes a bear-sized burrito, Grizz cant bring himself to eat such a majestic work of art so he carries it with him instead.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: The Bears meet Charlie when he signs up on a home-sharing website to spend a weekend with the Bears and Charlie turns out to be the worst possible house guest for the Bears.

programme.title: Jean Jacket
programme.desc: The Bears find a bedazzled jean jacket in a dumpster. But after the Bears fight over who gets control of the jacket, they have to consider that their denim blessing has become a curse.

programme.title: Food Truck
programme.desc: The Bears open up a food truck after being disappointed by the food options available to them. They start selling their food to animals... until the animals go a little crazy.

programme.title: Primal
programme.desc: Have the Bears lost their survival instincts by living in the modern world? Grizz wants to know, so he purposely gets the Bears lost in the deep forest.

programme.title: Everyday Bears
programme.desc: Its a normal day for the Bears. This means that Ice gets in a fight with a Roomba, Pandas life gets turned upside down when a mouse invades his room, and Grizz gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Nom Nom
programme.desc: When Nom Nom shows up on the Bears doorstep, dishevelled and deposed from his spot as cutest internet star ever after a recent meltdown, he enlists the Bears to help him regain his title.

programme.title: The Road
programme.desc: This episode takes place when the Bears are young cubs! The three, on their way through the desert, come upon a giant warehouse and they try to make this paradise their home.

programme.title: Shush Ninjas
programme.desc: The Bears are fed up with the decay of etiquette at todays theatres and take it upon themselves to be the police of the theatre.

programme.title: Pet Shop
programme.desc: The three Baby Bears try to get adopted at a pet shop and find a new home.

programme.title: My Clique
programme.desc: Chloe, a child prodigy, finds it difficult to connect with her much older classmates. The Bears take her under their wing, showing her how to make great college friends.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: Grizz comes home with a live crab and thinks it can become a pet for the brothers to share. However, after the crab pinches Ice Bears ear, Panda and Grizz have to get their brother to the hospital.

programme.title: Cupcake Job
programme.desc: When the Bears beloved laptop breaks, they have to get jobs for the first time ever. Working at a trendy cupcake shop, the Bears find that the working world is much tougher than they realised.

programme.title: Pandas Sneeze
programme.desc: When a Vine video of his very lovable sneeze goes viral, Panda becomes a cute sensation, which causes Nom Nom to try to fend off of this new challenger to his throne.

programme.title: Brother Up
programme.desc: After Panda stumbles and accidentally scares a pack of wolves away in the process, the hierarchy of the Bears is disrupted and suddenly, Panda has become the alpha bear.

programme.title: Tote Life
programme.desc: The Bears realise that eco-friendly tote bags are their way of gaining acceptance amongst the progressive people of the Bay Area after being shamed for asking for plastic grocery bags.

programme.title: Video Date
programme.desc: Panda is an avid e-dater and when a French woman matches with him and agrees to a video chat date, the Bears engineer the situation so that Panda can show his best side, even if its exaggerated.

programme.title: Chloe And Ice Bear
programme.desc: Chloe realises that Ice Bear only runs errands for his brothers so she is determined to show him a fun day in the city, even if it means staying in a museum after it closes.

programme.title: Hibernation
programme.desc: When the city plans to destroy the Bears cave in order to make way for a new cell phone tower, Grizz and Panda must find evidence from their past that proves they have rights to their land.

programme.desc: When the city plans to destroy the Bears cave in order to make way for a new cell phone tower, Grizz and Panda must find evidence from their past that proves they have rights to their land.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Brentford have never won an away league game against Aston Villa (D6 L3), with the Bees only facing Stoke (14) and Halifax Town (11) more often on the road without ever winning in their league history.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Southampton have won their last two Premier League games against Chelsea, as many as in their previous 18 (D5 L11). They last won three consecutive league games against the Blues between 1979 and 1985.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25

programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Hilarious Family
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Joneses: The Wrong Nemesis
programme.desc: With new husband Webb now deceased, Robin stands to inherit a fortune - with a little help from Sheldon, the familys lawyer.

programme.title: Kirk Franklins A Gospel Christmas
programme.desc: A young assistant pastor is assigned to a new church a month before Christmas. Banding together with her new congregation, she discovers a new home and finds a little Christmas romance along the way!

programme.title: You Cant Escape Me
programme.desc: Having freed herself from her abusive spouse, an aspiring artist thinks she is safe in Seattle with a college friend - only to find herself in danger again. But time she is going to be prepared.

programme.title: Historic Buildings
programme.desc: Buddy heads to Chicago to one of the oldest buildings, the Berghoff, famous for their beer and schnitzel. Then hes off to Husk in Nashville, where this spot is putting a unique spin on Southern Classics.

programme.title: Beyond The Sea
programme.desc: Seafood may not be your first thought when you think of a city like Detroit, Michigan, but at the Belgian-inspired Cadieux Cafe, Buddy tries the best bowl of steamed mussels and braised Belgian rabbit.

programme.title: Between The Bread
programme.desc: Buddy sees whats between the bread at two old school joints that hold a special place in his heart. Hes heading to Fiores House of Quality to taste their legendary Italian sandwiches.

programme.title: Lasting Legends
programme.desc: Buddy hits up two time-tested restaurants that have become lasting legends. First up is Triple Crown, where hell taste the house-made dim sum that has kept customers coming back for almost thirty years!

programme.title: Legends In The Making
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants that, despite recent openings, are on their way to becoming legends. Starting with Frontier in Chicago, Illinois which invites you to eat like the pioneers did.

programme.title: From Home To Hotspot
programme.desc: Buddy checks out two legendary restaurants that originated as peoples actual homes. First, hes going to the Loveless Cafe to taste their southern staples like crispy fried chicken and tender pork chops.

programme.title: One Ingredient Wonders
programme.desc: Buddy is visiting two restaurants that craft their legendary menus around one-star ingredients. First up, he heads to Sweet Potato Sensations in Detroit, Michigan.

programme.title: Neighborhood Joints
programme.desc: Buddy visits two neighbourhood joints that have been thriving since the 1940s. First, Buddy tries the famous Bisteca Fiorentina and homemade pasta at Gene and Georgetti.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: At the age of seven, Janets father, tough-talking Joe Jackson, puts her to work in the family show. Her father never asked if she wanted to be a performer, so its down to Janet to find her own path.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: After two unsuccessful albums and a failed marriage, Janet decides that if shes going to have a musical career, it will be on her own terms; she has to take control of her life.

programme.desc: Meet one man who converted a charter bus into his very own adventure home on wheels, and a couple who transport their renters back in time with their 1960s inspired tiny trailer retreat.

programme.desc: The remaining three are pitted against each other in a bid to claim the other two places. Entering the kitchen, they discover that todays Pressure Test has been set by none other than Peter Gilmore.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The Top 3 arrive to find the kitchen set up for a cook-along. Todays challenge represents the gateway to the Semi Final, with a sizeable advantage up for grabs.

programme.desc: Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. Its up to Rubble and Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.desc: Big Red Chickens magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! // Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but hes lost! Dora and Boots have to get him to the show on time.

programme.title: Big Rig Blaze
programme.desc: When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! Theres nothing he cant pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes SMores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game
programme.desc: When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldies magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Hide-and-Go-Shark
programme.desc: Max and his friends visit Dad at the aquarium, but can they keep Dad from discovering Sharkdog?

programme.title: Green Around the Gills
programme.desc: Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: A Storm in Foggy Springs
programme.desc: A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Moms TV interview.

programme.title: Poots and Vegetables
programme.desc: Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isnt fish.

programme.title: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers / Pups Save the Mayors Assistant
programme.desc: When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Capn Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat. // Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdingers assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: Pups Save Monkey-Dinger
programme.desc: While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser
programme.desc: Rubble and Crews favorite book series has new additions! But when theres no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative.// The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser! But will they finish it before Rubble finds out?

programme.title: The Playgroup
programme.desc: Peppa and George are going to daycare. Its Georges first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Kylie Kangeroo
programme.desc: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Captain Daddy Dog
programme.desc: Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and hes bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Grampy Rabbits Dinosaur Park
programme.desc: To celebrate Freddy Foxs birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddys birthday treat.

programme.title: Snow Dreams
programme.desc: Bubu has fixed Frogas barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Backwards Ron day
programme.desc: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Rons Day. Theres nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Dino Cake / Dumplings
programme.desc: Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe. // Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Opera Cake
programme.desc: After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake while Olly noisily builds a stage for a Stump concert.

programme.title: The Robot Championship
programme.desc: Its the Robot Championship - and only the fastest, strongest, smartest robot will win! Using coding, can Blaze win enough sports to take home the Robot Championship trophy?

programme.title: Popcorn Goes to Kindergarten / The New Face of Num-Nuggets
programme.desc: The hamsters must save Popcorn when he accidentally goes to kindergarten with Bernie. // Greg is chosen as the face of a new flavour of Num-Nuggets but cant stand the taste.

programme.title: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor
programme.desc: The postmans truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep
programme.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Als sheep runaway and Mayor Humdingers kittens go missing.

programme.title: Pups Make a Splash
programme.desc: When Capn Turbots boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks!

programme.title: The Crew Builds a Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds a Butterfly Garden
programme.desc: When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble and Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser
programme.desc: Rubble and Crews favorite book series has new additions! But when theres no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative.// The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser! But will they finish it before Rubble finds out?

programme.title: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut
programme.desc: Isas throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Ticos magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: The Trouble with Bunny Slugs / Life with Chumby
programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: Sharkdogs Got Talent
programme.desc: Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Maxs friends instead?

programme.title: Meteor Madness
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springss highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Pest Friends Forever
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he cant sit still!

programme.title: Bedtime Story
programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Lost Keys
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Georges New Dinosaur
programme.desc: When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Foxs Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Grandpa Pigs Train to the Rescue
programme.desc: Miss Rabbits train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Pizza / Bread
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: Hiccupism / Silence please
programme.desc: Barbabeau cant paint. He has a hiccup he cant get rid of. Just when hes about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen
programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapas cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: The Big Balloon Rescue
programme.desc: All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now its up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: Blazing Amazing Stories
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When its time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Pups Pit Crew / Pups Fight Fire
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new "super trike". // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift
programme.desc: Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: Saltwater Studios / Sand Crabby
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they cant decide which genre of song to play. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.desc: When Harry takes the hamsters to the mall for picture day, Lil Pal runs off. // When Harry takes Popcorn to school, he puts Mondo and Clover in temporary joint command.

programme.title: Video Game Land A Monster Machine Super Special Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome to VIDEO GAME LAND! When Blaze and Crusher get zapped into a magic arcade machine, they must beat four epic levels to win the game and return back home. Are they up for the challenge? Or will this adventure end in a GAME OVER?!

programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Ceviche for Dinner
programme.desc: When Dads cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And theyll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Surfs Up, Sharkdog!
programme.desc: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Madame Gazelles Leaving Party
programme.desc: The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queens Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Desert Island
programme.desc: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Perfume
programme.desc: After smelling Granny Pigs perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Popcorn / Banana
programme.desc: Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup
programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamamas birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Relay Tales / The Barbababies World
programme.desc: Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Space Alien Adventure!
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormys jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: The Blaze Family
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blazes family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove theyre the worlds fastest family!

programme.title: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus
programme.desc: We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular
programme.desc: Farmer Yumis carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug
programme.desc: When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hanks pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, its impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Paddingtons Earth Day Mission / Paddingtons Special Spring Harvest Celebration
programme.desc: Itd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? // Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor wont take a bath before their family photo, its up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: A Guayabera For Tico / Falling Estrellas
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it on the way to Ticos house. // Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky, but it loses three stars! Dora has to get them back in time.

programme.title: Video Game Heroes
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Sharks home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Return of the Nightwalker
programme.desc: Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Dennis Drones On
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog Sitting
programme.desc: While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just cant keep him inside.

programme.title: Fish Fiesta Freakout
programme.desc: Everyones excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but its getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Pups Save a High-Flying Hen / Pups Save a Sloth
programme.desc: After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, its up to the Paw Patrol to rescue her. // Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: Pups Save the Flying Food
programme.desc: Mr. Porters delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere!

programme.desc: Peppa accidentally crashes Mummy Pigs computer, so Daddy Pig tries to fix it.

programme.title: The Pet Competition
programme.desc: Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: The Noisy Night
programme.desc: Peppas family is staying at Cousin Chloes house. Its been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: The Wishing Well
programme.desc: Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well shes got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Stuck!
programme.desc: Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, its an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Switcheroo
programme.desc: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Frogas strawberry plants.

programme.title: Avocado Sushi / Poi
programme.desc: Chef is so focused on his avocados perfect ripeness that he ignores the rest of his avocado sushi recipe. // Chefs friend inspires him to bring Hawaii home by making poi and decorating the Stump-staycation style.

programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamamas birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Relay Tales / The Barbababies World
programme.desc: Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Space Alien Adventure!
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormys jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: The Blaze Family
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blazes family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove theyre the worlds fastest family!

programme.title: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus
programme.desc: We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular
programme.desc: Farmer Yumis carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug
programme.desc: When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hanks pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, its impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Paddingtons Earth Day Mission / Paddingtons Special Spring Harvest Celebration
programme.desc: Itd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? // Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: Europe Road Trip: A Bite of Transylvania / Europe Road Trip: Greece is the Word
programme.desc: When the Louds bus gets a flat tire, theyre invited to stay the night in a spooky couples mysterious castle. // During a tour of the Parthenon, Lincoln puts on a soldiers helmet which sends him back to Ancient Greece.

programme.desc: When Brainy bosses all the Smurfs around one time too many, Jokey makes him compete for a fake award. // When they get captured by Gargamel, Papa Smurf, Willow and Vanity offer to help the sorcerer impress his mother.

programme.desc: Vanitys attempt to cure a zit with a magic spell accidentally turns him into a lizard instead. // To increase interest in the newspaper, Reporter decides to interview Gargamel face to face!

programme.desc: When Lincolns mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. // After Lucy reads Lincolns fortune and claims his day will "end in disaster

programme.title: Squidinas Little Helper / I Smell a Pat

programme.title: PL-1413 / In the Mood to Feud
programme.desc: Plankton travels two thousand years into the future and finds a few unfamiliar faces. // SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy find themselves in the middle of a long-standing feud between the Narwhals and the Planktons.

programme.title: Mooned! / Hysterical History
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to catch an ultra-rare jellyfish and enlists the help of former jellyfishing champion, Kevin. // On a trip to the museum, SpongeBob and Patrick teach Sandy all about Bikini Bottoms fascinating, yet questionable, history.

programme.title: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, its up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade
programme.desc: Now that Freds leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harms way...no matter what! // Patricks lemonade stand isnt doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: Mustard O Mine / Shopping List
programme.desc: When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: Operation Dad
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: Gossip Girl
programme.desc: When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Butterfly Effect / The Green House
programme.desc: After spilling an experiment of Lisas, Lincoln sets off a chain reaction that unravels the household. // In an effort to be more energy-efficient Lincoln rallies his family to stop using so much electricity.

programme.title: Along Came a Sister / Chore and Peace
programme.desc: Lincoln is given the responsibility of taking home his classes tarantula, but it gets loose and wreaks havoc! // Thinking he has the worst chores, Lincoln decides to go on strike until someone will swap chores with him.

programme.title: Donnie Goes Deep
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and theyre not alone... theres a monster down there with them!

programme.title: Mooned! / Hysterical History
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to catch an ultra-rare jellyfish and enlists the help of former jellyfishing champion, Kevin. // On a trip to the museum, SpongeBob and Patrick teach Sandy all about Bikini Bottoms fascinating, yet questionable, history.

programme.title: Extreme Sports / Squirrel Record
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals. // Sandy finds a book of worlds records, and tries to break them all with SpongeBobs help.

programme.title: Dont Lose Your Head
programme.desc: Chaos ensues as Max and the Midknights try to break Uncle Budrick out of the castle before he is beheaded. With Mumblins help, they narrowly escape King Gastleys clutches and later learn from Kevyn that King Conrad is alive!

programme.title: Really Loud Music
programme.desc: Hoping to win a song-writing contest, Luna contemplates whether she should go with a song thats true to her sound or try to make something that the whole world will love.

programme.title: Jeers for Fears / Tea Tale Heart
programme.desc: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears. // Lola discovers Lucy has an old, fragile doll and decides she must borrow it - no matter what Lucy says.

programme.title: The Loudest Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Faced with spending Thanksgiving apart, Lori and Bobby try to bring their crazy families together for the first time.

programme.title: Yes Man
programme.desc: The Loud sisters enlist "The Master of Convincing" (AKA Lincoln) to teach them how to ask Mom and Dad for money.

programme.title: Donnie Goes Deep
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and theyre not alone... theres a monster down there with them!

programme.title: SquidBird / Allergy Attack!
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes hes developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: Big Top Flop / Sandy, Help Us!
programme.desc: When the circus comes to town and steals his customers away, Mr. Krabs tries to sabotage the show. // Sandy spends the day solving everyones issues, only to return home to her own monster of a problem.

programme.title: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparents marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: Miles Has Visions
programme.desc: When AWOL starts seeing visions of the future right before they happen, Captain Man believes it must be the work of Swellviews leading time-crime villain, The Time Jerker.

programme.title: Knight and Danger
programme.desc: When the Knight Squads arch enemy, Ryker, is unleashed on Swellview, Kid Danger and Captain Man take him down to Burger Castle only to be tricked into joining forces with the villain.

programme.title: The Manager with the Planager
programme.desc: Lincoln encourages Clyde to showcase his amazing skills as a drummer, but pushes him too far. Luan meets her comedy idol while performing a comedy gig at Sunset Canyon. And Luna helps Leni ace her history test by utilizing her love of fashion.

programme.title: The Banana Split Decision
programme.desc: Its parent teacher conference night and the Loud parents find themselves endlessly running around from class to class. Lincoln has his heart set on the Banana Split that their parents have promised if the Loud kids get more good reviews than bad.

programme.title: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teachers Pests
programme.desc: A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBobs there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: The Patterfly Effect / A Space Affair to Remember
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade
programme.desc: Now that Freds leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harms way...no matter what! // Patricks lemonade stand isnt doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: Europe Road Trip: A Bite of Transylvania / Europe Road Trip: Greece is the Word
programme.desc: When the Louds bus gets a flat tire, theyre invited to stay the night in a spooky couples mysterious castle. // During a tour of the Parthenon, Lincoln puts on a soldiers helmet which sends him back to Ancient Greece.

programme.title: Left in the Dark / Get the Message
programme.desc: When Lincoln wants to watch the finale of his favorite show, he has to beat each sister to get to the couch first! // After Lincoln leaves a scathing voicemail on Loris phone, he realizes he has to erase it before Lori hears it.

programme.title: Out of Step / Pyramid Scheme
programme.desc: Afraid to be embarrassed at a dance-off, Draculaura secretly gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted shoes. // Cleo wants the lead role for the school play and raids her familys ancient tomb for a perfect, superior costume.

programme.title: A Musical to Remember Pt. 1
programme.desc: With Clyde finally back from camp, Lincoln has the entire day planned for maximum fun for their last day of summer. However, things go awry when Lincoln accidentally eats some of Lisas memory-erasing jelly beans.

programme.title: Family Lies
programme.desc: Its Parents Night at SW.A.G. and Ray must get Danger Force to take a picture with their parents in the school or be shut down. But things get complicated when Chapa hires Jake Hart to be her fake dad.

programme.title: Earth To Bose
programme.desc: Strange things start to happen to Bose when he finds himself in love with an alien.

programme.title: Beat the Parents
programme.desc: Nervous about meeting his girlfriends parents, Max enlists help from Phoebe, whose charms ultimately backfire and leave Max banned from ever seeing his girlfriend again.

programme.title: Welcome to Byjovia
programme.desc: Unsatisfied with the troubadour lifestyle, Max dreams of becoming a knight. After a run-in with a thief Max and Uncle Budrick travel to Byjovia, Budricks hometown, but when they arrive, its not as Uncle Budrick remembers it.

programme.title: Lets Break A Deal / A Dish Come True
programme.desc: Rusty strikes a deal with Morpheus that for a seemingly small price, Morpheus will cast spells for him. // Lincoln starts to work at Dads restaurant when he hears that the best employee wins a dish named in their honor.

programme.title: Out of the Picture / Room with a Feud
programme.desc: Afraid theyll be forgotten, Lincoln and Clyde want to make a splash in the yearbook and crash group photos. // Seeing his sisters fight with their roommates, Lincoln suggests a room shuffle based on a compatibility test.

programme.title: Donnie Goes Deep
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and theyre not alone... theres a monster down there with them!

programme.title: Swamp Mates
programme.desc: Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure.

programme.title: Mind the Gap / Dirty Bubble Returns
programme.desc: Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBobs teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. // The newly reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting
programme.desc: Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBobs Bad Habit
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob cant stop biting his nails, but he also cant figure out why!

programme.title: Handemonium / Breakin
programme.desc: Planktons giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: Crunch
programme.desc: A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the videogame they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. Its no longer a game.

programme.title: Down The Rabbit Hole
programme.desc: Jaz, Errol, Dom and Caspar begin to test the shifting boundaries of their own and others psychosis. Aroundthem, the building assumes a malevolent life of its own.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Eddie and Denny engineer another classic game-play staple: A race-against time for a life hanging in thebalance. Jaz determines they will pass that test, win that race, save that life. An unlikely source thinksotherwise.

programme.title: Failure To Launch
programme.desc: A thirty something slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so hell finally vacate their home.

programme.title: The Draft, Smash Bash
programme.desc: The top 15 chefs are drafted into their three teams; the contestants must prepare an all-American smash burger that proves their cooking abilities.

programme.title: Curry In A Hurry
programme.desc: The 14 remaining chefs are tasked with preparing a curry dish that promises to pack a punch with only 30 minutes on the clock; the winning dish gives the entire team immunity and claims the top-level kitchen for the next challenge.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Constricted
programme.desc: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi cant help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

programme.title: Economics Of Shame
programme.desc: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

programme.title: Roschach
programme.desc: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Tenfold
programme.desc: Bruno must get to the center of a victims incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champs early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisas mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the worlds most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. Its the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Is a cooking program that will present a healthy, special, and filling menu suitable for breaking the fast. Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The shows mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesnt have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owners personality. This program will provide inspiration from peoples stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesias wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesias wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

Watch as some of Canadas finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMPs Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble and rustic background troubled by familial and financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home and fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Anamika - Thriller Serial
programme.desc: Bound for over 200 years, and in a quest for indomitable power, an evil entity that Anamika releases by ill fate threatens her lover Nandas life and her boss Rishis unrequited love for her. Setting off an age-old battle between good and evil.

programme.title: MALAR
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malars ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner and a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destinys plan for them?

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthis naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted and burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmadas mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father and his estranged family entwines with Kathirs task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace and heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds and win over her husbands large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gauthams controlling aunt Bairavi and her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her familys financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the familys peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst lifes many hardships?

programme.desc: A property dispute ruins the relationship between two brothers, Mayandi and Virumandi. Matters become worse when Mayandi dies and Virumandis son seeks revenge on his family.

programme.desc: Host Steven Ma calls on nine star chefs to create a "golden feast" for TVBs 55th anniversary in Taiwan! The programme also visits famous chefs in the city to gather valuable ingredients.

programme.title: Finance Magazine 2024
programme.desc: Finance Magazine closely follows the market, Hong Kong stocks trends and the property market situation. Through interviews with industry insiders and market analysis, it explores the hot topics in Hong Kong and international finance.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Sunday Report 2024
programme.desc: Each week, Sunday Report focuses on the newsmakers and also takes to the streets to gather opinions on politics, current affairs and matters that people care about.

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Super Trio - Christmas Special 2024
programme.desc: TVB Jade brings you endless entertainment with concurrent dramas and sitcoms, as well as the latest news, variety and infotainment programmes from TVB.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentlemen
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Billionaire Story
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, its the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Time Concert 2024
programme.desc: After 20 years, the Girls are back on stage! "Time Concert 2024" revives nostalgic melodies, celebrating two decades of music with a dazzling showcase and a competition for the top hits of the era!

programme.title: The King of Night Market
programme.desc: Taiwans famous night markets go head-to-head as iconic snacks compete for the ultimate title of The King of Night Market. Who will reign supreme?

programme.title: On-Lie Game
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Szeto Chung and his colleague, Inspector Siu Mei-ting, tackle high-tech scams. While investigating an online dating fraud, Szeto reconnects with his ex, Cheung Wai, who is entangled in a London gold fraud. As Chi-ho and Cheung Wai become further involved, Szeto and Mei-ting team up to dismantle the powerful syndicate behind these crimes.

programme.title: Love On A Diet
programme.desc: Mini, heartbroken and overeating, weighs over 200 pounds after her breakup with a handsome boyfriend. She meets Fatso, an obese man who helps her shed the weight to win back her ex. As Mini transforms, she starts to develop feelings for Fatso.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Hilarious Family
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.
